Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Water as the “source of life” and air as the “life gas” are inevitably polluted in the process of social development, and nearly 80% of the diseases in the world are caused by the pollution of water and air. Based on the eternal theme of health, Peishi has been striving to build a platform of Internet of Things (IoT) + health industry to provide healthy environment solutions for the industry.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: Human Activity Behavior Recording Training Data
